Product: US Toy Pirate Skull and Bone Bead Necklaces (Package of 12) (Brand: U.S. Toy)
Category: Toys & Games
Rating: 5 stars (Verified Purchase)
Review Summary: They were perfect for the purpose intended
Full Review: These were purchased for a pirate-themed conference as filler in a treasure chest. They were perfect for the purpose intended. We later gave them out to children in Halloween packages, and the kids loved them -- so two uses with one purchase. They were very well made.

Product: US Toy Pirate Skull and Bone Bead Necklaces (Package of 12) (Brand: U.S. Toy)
Category: Toys & Games
Rating: 5 stars (Verified Purchase)
Review Summary: Highly Recommended accessory for Pirate Parties!
Full Review: Wow! Delighted by these necklaces!  There were so many!  Each individually wrapped with a cardboard thingy. Light plastic necklaces.
 30 inches in circumference.
I had them for any of my 'pirate' friends to wear as an accessory to their costumes, if needed.  I also put some in a treasure chest which I had filled with fake coins, pearls, and these extra necklaces.  Great quality and detail.  Recommended!!!!
